title: Design and Build Authentication Mechanism
description: As a user, I want to securely access the portal, so that my account is protected with multiple verification factors.
attributes_and_rules: Authentication using password, OTP, biometric verification; encryption standards; session timeout; device management; financial data protection compliance.
core_domain_objects: Authentication Mechanism, Verification Factors, Encryption Standards
acceptance_criteria: User can authenticate using multiple factors; encryption standards are enforced; sessions timeout after idle period; compliant with data protection regulations.
test_cases: Given the user has entered valid credentials, When multi-factor authentication is performed, Then access to the portal is granted.

epic_title: Responsive User Interface and Personalized Dashboard
title: Develop Device-Responsive User Interface
description: As a customer, I want an optimal viewing experience on any device, so that I can access the portal seamlessly.
attributes_and_rules: Responsive design for desktop, tablet, mobile; optimized viewing; accessibility guidelines compliance.
acceptance_criteria: User interface displays correctly on all devices; meets accessibility guidelines.
test_cases: Given the user accesses the portal on different devices, When the interface is loaded, Then it adapts to the device screen appropriately.

epic_title: Responsive User Interface and Personalized Dashboard
title: Create Personalized Dashboard
description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can quickly access my account information and offers.
attributes_and_rules: Dynamic dashboard; displays banking products, account summaries, offers; based on customer profile and preferences.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays personalized content based on user profile.
test_cases: Given a user logs into the portal, When account data is displayed, Then personalized offers and account summaries are shown.

epic_title: Core Banking Integration and Database Synchronization
title: Develop Secure APIs and Integration Connectors
description: As a portal developer, I want real-time data exchange with the core banking system, so that operations are synchronized.
attributes_and_rules: Secure APIs; integration connectors; real-time data exchange.
acceptance_criteria: Seamless data exchange between portal and core system; secure APIs in place.
test_cases: Given the portal performs operations, When integration with core system happens, Then data is exchanged in real-time.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflow
title: Build Structured Workflows for Account Opening
description: As a customer, I want a guided account opening process, so that I can complete it digitally with ease.
attributes_and_rules: Workflow steps; inline validations; data prefill; save partially completed requests.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can complete account opening digitally; workflows have inline validations and data prefill.
test_cases: Given a customer starts an account opening, When they proceed through workflow, Then the process is guided and validates input.

title: Implement Document Upload Feature
description: As a user, I want to securely upload required documents, so that my identity and address proofs are submitted through the portal.
attributes_and_rules: Secure upload; file encryption; malware scan; type and size validation.
acceptance_criteria: Users can upload documents securely; files are encrypted, scanned, and validated.
test_cases: Given a user uploads a document, When the document is processed, Then it is encrypted, scanned for malware, and validated.

epic_title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notification Framework
title: Develop Real-Time Status Tracking System
description: As a user, I want to receive real-time updates on my requests, so that I am always informed about the progress.
attributes_and_rules: Background event-driven system; real-time status updates; automated notifications.
acceptance_criteria: Users receive real-time status updates and notifications for their requests.
test_cases: Given a user submits a request, When the request status changes, Then a real-time update is provided and a notification is sent.

epic_title: User Interaction History and Activity Logging
title: Create Comprehensive Logging Framework
description: As a user, I want to view my interaction history, so that I can track my activities and requests within the portal.
attributes_and_rules: Logging framework; record user interactions, submitted requests; secure audit trails.
acceptance_criteria: Interaction history is available to users; secure audit logging is implemented.
test_cases: Given a user interacts with the portal, When their activity is logged, Then they can view the interaction history securely.

title: Develop Configurable RBAC System
description: As an administrator, I want to assign roles and permissions, so that access control is enforced based on user profile and authorization level.
attributes_and_rules: Configurable RBAC; roles, permissions; privilege levels; least privilege enforcement.
acceptance_criteria: Roles and permissions are configured; access control is enforced.
test_cases: Given an administrator configures roles, When a user accesses the portal, Then their actions are limited based on assigned roles.

epic_title: Data Security, Privacy, and Compliance Layer
title: Establish Data Encryption Policies
description: As a security officer, I want to implement data protection measures, so that customer financial information is safeguarded.
attributes_and_rules: Data encryption; access control; compliance checks; monitoring and incident response.
core_domain_objects: Data Encryption, Access Control, Compliance Procedures
acceptance_criteria: Data is encrypted; access controls are implemented; compliance checks are automated.
test_cases: Given data protection measures are in place, When customer data is handled, Then it is encrypted and compliant with regulations.
